name: Broken Skies
description:
A retro style time torn bullet hell blast!

This game was made in less than 10 days for bullethellgamejam

Keep in mind this game is still in early development, as such many bugs may be present.

Prologue: 

"The year is 2134"
 "The city is under siege"
 "Your squad has been tasked with taking down a dreadnought"

Controls:

Movement: W A S D or ARROW KEYS

Shooting: LEFT MB or SPACE

Super: SHIFT

Thanks for playing!

You can follow my work on Twitter or Itch.io
